Class Booking_System

java.lang.Object
APP.Booking_System
public class Booking_System
extends java.lang.Object
Represents the system which communicates with the player and the admin

    • Filter_Hours

      public int Filter_Hours​(java.lang.String slot)
      This method is used to filter the playgrounds by one slot if the playgrounds are available in that time
      Parameters:
      slot - The time which the player wants to filter the playgrounds according to
      Returns:
      a number to indicate if their is available playground with that time
